name: Hoothoot
flavorText:
It always stands
on one foot. It
changes feet so fast, the movement
can rarely be
seen.

previous.name: Furret
previous.flavorText:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.

next.name: Noctowl
next.flavorText:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.
